definition: To gradually enter a state of rest or sleep, typically at the end of the day or during nighttime. It commonly refers to the action of becoming unconscious and experiencing a temporary loss of awareness and responsiveness.

examples.german: Sie ist gestern auf dem Sofa eingeschlafen.
examples.english: She fell asleep on the couch yesterday.

examples.german: Wir sind während des Films eingeschlafen.
examples.english: We fell asleep during the movie.

examples.german: Die Kinder sind im Auto eingeschlafen.
examples.english: The children fell asleep in the car.
